#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;
vector<LL> g[60];

LL exp(int x, int y) {
    LL ans = 1, num = x;
    while (y) {
        if (y & 1) ans = ans * num;
        num = num * num;
        y >>= 1;
    }
    return ans;
}

void init() {
    for (int i = 3; i <= 55; i ++) {
        int up = (int)(pow(10000000000000000, 1.0 / i) + 1e-8);
        for (int j = 2; j <= up; j ++) {
            g[i].push_back(exp(j, i));
        }
    }
}

int main() {
    init();
    int T;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    while (T --) {
        bool sol = false;
        LL x;
        scanf("%lld", &x);
        LL tx = (LL)sqrt(x * 1.0);
        if (tx * tx == x || (tx - 1) * (tx - 1) == x)
            sol = true;
        for (int i = 3; i <= 55 && !sol; i ++) {
            auto pos = lower_bound(g[i].begin(), g[i].end(), x);
            if (pos == g[i].end() || *pos != x) continue;
            sol = true;
        }
        if (sol) puts("YES");
        else puts("NO");
    }
    return 0;
}
